section.title: bills of materials summarized view of Summarized Bill of Materials
section.para: A summarized Bill of Materials shows all the material requirements for an Item. The components for subassemblies are included in this view; however, the top-level subassemblies themselves are excluded. To view a summarized Bill of Materials, select the "Summarized Bill of Materials" option. The following screen will appear:
When displaying a summarized Bill of Materials, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the Item Number of the manufactured Item you would like to view a summarized Bill of Materials for.
Select to cause expired components to be listed in the "Bill of Materials" display. Expired components will display in red font.

Select a number using the arrow buttons, or manually enter a value up to a maximum of 999. Components that have been expired from the Bill of Materials within the specified number of days will be included in the display.
Select to cause future components to be listed in the "Bill of Materials" display. Future components will display in blue font.

Select a number using the arrow buttons, or manually enter a value up to a maximum of 999. Components that will be added in future to the Bill of Materials within the specified number of days will be included in the display.
Display lists summarized Bill of Materials components, using the specified parameters.
